resources.string: Our clan is international, we have players from different countries. We recruit only persons, who we like. That\'s why we haven\'t any conflicts in clan. Only good relationships between players and common interests make our clan solid. We don\'t need in skilled players, we need in good persons, who wanna learn SHC game.

Clan was created for training beginners, but our main assignment is making chaos in battles. If u wanna be like us - join. We like fair and honest games and hate liars and braggers. One of the most important things in our clan - discipline. Whoever loves discipline loves knowledge, but he who hates reproof is stupid.

string-array.name: rules
string-array.item:
All players must wear our tag
 Experts: -=W.L=- nickname |Ex|
 Mediums: -=W.L=- nickname |M|
 Academy: -=W.L=- nickname |A|
 - Academy must wear rank (A). |M| and |Ex| mustn't wear rank, if they want, they can delete it.
TurboMouse (2x or 3x and more clicks) and ShieldMaker - not allowed
Using few accounts in GR - not allowed
Insults clanmates and ur opponents in the game - not allowed
Leaving games like a rat - not allowed
Going inactive without informing Leader, Founder or Council - Not allowed
If you inactive for long time, we will put you out of our clan. But when you are active again and if you wanna join maybe we can recruit you one more time in clan.
If you left -=W.L=-, you left it forever.
